enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Prerequisite: Students must complete Psych 205-0 before taking this course.
title: WCAS PSYCH 371-0-20 Personality Research

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: A survey of current research in personality with emphasis on experimental approaches to the study of personality. Specific theories discussed will include (but are not limited to) the biological basis of introversion/extraversion, the theory of achievement motivation, and individual differences in proneness to anxiety and in sensitivity to reward and punishment.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Evaluations will be based upon two papers (a research proposal and a final project) as well as a midterm exam.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Readings will be taken from the current research literature.

subject: PSYCH
